On Race Day:

Registration will take place from 12.30 (place to be announced closer to date).

Anyone who has entered the race prior to 5pm on the 5th September, will be sent their race number by post. For later entrants, please collect your number at registration.
The race will begin at 2pm, at the court House, across from the Topaz Petrol station).
There will be 2 water stations, one at the mid point and one at the finish line.

Shower and changing facilities will be available on the day.
Public car Parking is available:
Beside the Station House Hotel on the N59 Galway rd (free).
At the Church beside the Court House across from the Topaz petrol station.
In the Supervalue car park on the Square (please note this car park operates shop hours).
Or on the street (free on Sundays).
Public toilets are available at:
The coach park, across from the Station House Hotel (coin operated)
In Supervalue, on The Square (across from the Alcock and Brown; enter and turn left at the trolleys).
At the Topaz petrol station.
